```jsx{3,6}
class Button extends React.Component {
state = {
color: this.props.color
};
render() {
const { color } = this.state; // ğŸ”´ `color` is stale!
return (
<button className={'Button-' + color}>
{this.props.children}
</button>
);
}
}
```
